title: Death Beneath the Christmas Tree
description: Frances Sedbury's sudden death, killed by rifle shots that caught her in the middle of the Living Christmas Tree, far outshown her life. It takes widow Mavis Lashley--who has the infallible intuitions of a native small-towner and the courage of her convictions--to dig deep into the local dirt to find out the truth. Not only about Frances's mysterious life and death but about the scandalous secret shenanigans of some church movers and shakers. Not to mention the deadly corruption that stretches from a rundown house in the country to an exclusive upper-class enclave and practically in Mavis's own backyard....
author: Robert Nordan
